title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375¬∞F (190¬∞C).
In small bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt.
In large mixer bowl, beat butter and both sugars until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract; beat well.
Gradually blend in flour mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks.

title: Simple Pasta Marinara
description: Classic Italian tomato sauce with fresh pasta
ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti or your favorite pasta
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
Add pasta and cook according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and saut√© for about 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in crushed tomatoes with their juices.
Add dried basil and oregano.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Drain pasta and serve with sauce. Top with fresh basil if desired.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Perfect breakfast pancakes for the whole family
steps: In a large bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Make a well in the center and pour in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Mix until smooth (some lumps are okay).
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter per pancake onto the griddle.
Brown on both sides and serve hot with maple syrup and toppings.
